name: Emotional Damage (Zeenaz)
description:
Emotional Damage is a fast and easy tower defence game. Players need to go deep into the mind, to defeat bad emotions deep in the roots of neurons

What should you do if you encounter Emotional Damage? Into the depths of the brain to impact bad emotions! 

Game controls: mouse click

Gameplay:

- Pick up available resources on the screen [Dopamine]

- Buy a mind defence tower, kill the bad mood

- Pick up and use spiritual props: [Love Bomb], [Medicene Bomb], [Idea Bulb], [Kitty Scratch]

Teams:

Programmer_0: Krison

Programmer_1: 高物

Programmer_2 + Artist: Zeena Zhang

Artist: Hannah (Yi-Han Lin)

Artist: Alicia Leng

Music & Sound Designer: Natasha Pearson
